text: Ewuwe ni amulikalukha mwesi, indache ya Nyasaye eyatoto, toto ye niye wachachia ebiloonje naye khandi niye ulibikalusia, kho arunje balia basuubila mana nibakhola amalayi khubulengâ€™aafu. Ne balia bakhaya balinyoola ebinywebwa ebia amaatsi kayia pa nende eshinyasio eshilulu khulwa obukhayi bwabu
